author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Following github issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41489
This PR backports in the CMSSW_13_0_3_patchHLT branch the following PRs, already merged in the HEAD of CMSSW_13_0_X:
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41454
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41473
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41484
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41402
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41368
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41400

The other PRs listed in that issue cannot, in my opinion, be considered that urgent; or alternatively they imply some larger updates than what is supposed for a quick fix that allows running at P5 during the (hopefully) few days needed to find a solution for the so far blocking issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41457

Before building 13_0_3_patch2 we can reconsider whether some additional PR could be further added here.

#### PR validation:

It builds
All PRs included here have been already successfully merged in the HEAD of CMSSW_13_0_X
title: Add PRs with fixes in view of a possible CMSSW_13_0_3_patch2 release
